page.title: 17MENZIESHILL LIBRARY, DUNDEE.
page.content: In{Menzieshill}we have a library which opened in{1969.}It holds{15,907}books and has{3,588 members}whose membership lasts{3 years.}The most popular book is{"Dinner of Herbs"}by{Catherine {Cookson}and there is a waiting list for it.The opening hours are Monday, Tuesday and Friday from{9:30am}to {7:30pm,}Wednesday{9am}to{5pm}and Thursday and Saturday from{9:30am}to {1:30pm.}The library cost{Â£23,500}to build.The library has a study room which is now a staff room. The books that usually cost the most are{reference.}Quite a lot of people forget to return books so there is a {fine.}The most you can fine one person is{Â£2.40.}Usually the busiest season is{winter.}Sometimes{80 to 100}books are given out in a day.
